A

Address - Class in <Unnamed>
Address Class: Contains the framework and means of conveyance for record attributes
Address() - Constructor for class Address
Initialises default values when a new Address is instantiated
Address(int, String, String) - Constructor for class Address
Passes input into Address attributes

C

createRecord(Address) - Method in class IpDAO
createRecord instantiates an Address object, while the for loop checks the entered shortIp attribute against the previously stored records.

D

deleteRecord(int) - Method in class IpDAO
deleteRecord(int id) method matches input to preexisting address id attribute, address record is removed from the list of records
deleteRecord(Address) - Method in class IpDAO
deleteRecord(Address address) method takes an address and deletes that address from the list of records

G

Prompts the user for input and retrives input as a double, then compares user input against a minimum and maximum value

Prompts the user for input and retrives input as a double, then compares user input against a minimum and maximum value

IpDAO constructor instantiates the IpDAO class

IpDAO method attempts to create a file named by the contents of "fileName" variable, if file already exists, and error message is displayed to console

myList - Variable in class IpDAO
 

R

readList() - Method in class IpDAO
readList() method reads stored records from file named by fileName variable and attempts to assign record attributes to a new Address
retrieveRecord(int) - Method in class IpDAO
retrieveRecord method attempts to return a record with an ID attribute that matches user input

W
